Reviews.Title: “far away from city, but very nice one”
Reviews.Author: anamteX
Reviews.Content: looking really cheap place stay dont care cleanliness mind flying room every 2 minutes place staff front desk somewhat friendly lady checked us seemed annoyed rude asked friend could get room 2 queen beds tried explain booked room 2 queen beds pay additional fee room fair size payed bathroom clean dust coffee maker bathroom screen never cleaned stay shower made people 50 us get hair shower head often woken middle night people screaming lot kinda felt like bad neighborhood times greek restaurant site looked run asked one staff front desk good told right away wasnt good place eat small swimming pool site chairs tables pool clean well kept personally would never stay recommend others

Reviews.Title: “Happy with hotel”
Reviews.Author: mendiprambler
Reviews.Content: free shuttle lax great worked pickup driver arrived friendly staff checked even though planes overhead loud annoying begin slept like baby till morning big tv clean bathroom comfy bed morning used free taxi phone call taxi came within minutes

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing, but close to the metro.”
Reviews.Author: moony606
Reviews.Content: extremely noisy location main road constant traffic throughout night make things worse water pipes kept making noise night could hardly sleep staff friendly butter choice stay away

Reviews.Title: “Excellent accommodation”
Reviews.Author: CarolsNorthwich
Reviews.Content: stayed 7 nights absolutely complaints 3rd 4th stay entire staff went way pleasant helpful free shuttle airport free breakfast good coffee pool vending machines nice greek restaurant next door come lax la jazz per year staff super 8 people jan sam make us feel like family

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel - enjoyed our stay”
Reviews.Author: Nicholas H
Reviews.Content: hotel service people work super friendly clean rooms near airport free breakfast free internet well free parking free ice laundry etc always looking 4 stars charge everything internet parking breakfast airport ride etc hotel changed idea super 8 recommend enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Basic hotel far from City centre”
Reviews.Author: unknown151011
Reviews.Content: great accomodations convenient location close beach lax bus terminal mall

Reviews.Title: “we had a good experience at this hotel”
Reviews.Author: glyn-ally2
Reviews.Content: stayed 1 night 20th april 2010 arriving didnt bother us bed problems

Reviews.Title: “Run-down, difficult location, good restaurant”
Reviews.Author: elfrenchmann
Reviews.Content: motel good flight served free shuttles near local bus terminal access los angeles rooms breakfast fairly ordinary adequate price didnt trouble noise theres excellent greek restaurant round corner

Reviews.Title: “Dump”
Reviews.Author: Patrickmclaughlin
Reviews.Content: convenient location competitive price walkable restaurants rental car post office great place return rental car walk hotel take shuttle lax flight path hotel breakfast waste time cereal toast stay problem

Reviews.Title: “Hotel which you should avoid.”
Reviews.Author: Brownhawk
Reviews.Content: decided break long trip australia new york city nights stop lax rest glad flight delayed 4 hours passengers tight connections missed ring motel free phone arrival lounge wait free little shuttle bus come pick cool really long flight much around motel used machines outside coke chips chocolate bars also walked burger king 10 minutes away next morning shuttle bus dropped back departure terminal 10 minute ride brilliant great value motel worth travelling long needing rest wanting stress make day connection waiting also free breakfast type thing reception waiting shuttle bus americans knew got coffee left

Reviews.Title: “decent enough, but difficult to get to and far from everything”
Reviews.Author: J0hn55555
Reviews.Content: stayed two nights christmas reviewers right staff pleasant breakfast simply dry cereal fruit anyone great pastries main complaint bedding kingsize bed queen size sheet bottom sheet laid sleeping sheets night planes land right across motel noise stopped 900 pm start 530 dont think would stay

Reviews.Title: “Nice view but a bit rundown”
Reviews.Author: thesupr
Reviews.Content: cant beat location got rental car airport right around corner rooms clean enough bathroom could definitely use updating small sink tiny shower stall tile shower floor looks dirty bring shower shoes also parking lot gets full quickly plenty parking street side hotel

Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend”
Reviews.Author: Balanceur
Reviews.Content: hotel located near lax airport provide free shuttle airport room would expect super 8 less greatest location arent restaurant anything going around hotel people bad neighborhood didnt see anyone street fortunately us car rental agency right accross street

Reviews.Title: “Pleasant stay, minimum hassle.”
Reviews.Author: RSH14
Reviews.Content: booked one night flying area bad put chair behind door case anyone tried get night full husband went get pizza stayed room night scared go would avoid costs pay bit safe motel even charged credit card twice

Reviews.Title: “Check your room”
Reviews.Author: aoc17
Reviews.Content: motel convenient lax rooms good price however motel right flight path planes landing lax ie starts across road noisy supposedly heard planes started hotel staff gave us room lower floor provide sort noise youre deep sleeper ear plugs motel good overnight stay

Reviews.Title: “A Poor Experience Never To Be Repeated”
Reviews.Author: hoteliers
Reviews.Content: two picky daughters stayed five nights hotel pleasantly surprised hotel cosy room super clean bathroom little noisy proximity lax cool look planes landing breakfast ok could variety muffins airport pick drop would highly recommend hotel like save money stay nice hotel back next time

Reviews.Title: “Not as bad as it's painted”
Reviews.Author: trekerLiverpool
Reviews.Content: chose super 8 primarily cost airport location glad choice using bank hotel phones airport reserve room arriving hotel took pleasantly surprised room spotlessly clean huge bed plus free speedy wifi many places wander youre hungry usual food places deliver room youre budget need somewhere close airport wed recommend super 8

Reviews.Title: “Horrible Insight vacation hotel”
Reviews.Author: LeonetteS
Reviews.Content: nothing need close airport price motel job simple convenient need bus anywhere lax local buses motel really close bus transit centre

Reviews.Title: “It's not what it seems (sadly)”
Reviews.Author: GuillemTM
Reviews.Content: almost directly start lax quickly noticed rooms sound proof noise quite loud took took good pictures planes landing directly north window change rooms hour check small red walls bathroom headboard blankets king bed second rooms usd plus taxes saturday night within blocks lax steps car rental served purpose early departure

Reviews.Title: “Not bad”
Reviews.Author: ersaro
Reviews.Content: please take advice stay away awful motel even worse motel staff steal whatever forget open room lost piece trying get help manager matter told get lost much better place area many options nearby closer airport

Reviews.Title: “Good but far away from city”
Reviews.Author: alex_210
Reviews.Content: daughter stayed arriving around midnight lax staff helpful problem getting shuttle airport getting room given room close office adequate clean room felt safe overnight stay take shuttle back airport morning get rental car problem

Reviews.Title: “Good for motorists; close to motorway”
Reviews.Author: Archie02DE
Reviews.Content: stop la stayed one night hotel rate reasonable room big clean basic everything worked staff friendly helpful would stay

Reviews.Title: “Just Average”
Reviews.Author: Dianc
Reviews.Content: close lax airport clean would definitely visit

Reviews.Title: “Poor location, no air conditioning”
Reviews.Author: AEmgee
Reviews.Content: location inconvenience take tram 45 last stop walk 15mins 20 mins station far away city centre rooms nice reception nice see sun room see sun even listen new husband morning pick heavy package leisure
